languages.text: "Это не было ложью. Мы бы не посмели". {n}Мужчина переводит взгляд на Кибеллу — ее черные волосы, ее шрамы.{/n} "Нааки..."

traits.locale_text: "Мы бы не смели лгать Вашей Светлости". {n}Мужчина переводит взгляд на Кибеллу — ее черные волосы, ее шрамы.{/n} "Нааки..."

languages.text: "We did not lie. We would never have dared." {n}Randor looks over at Kibellah, her dark hair, her scars.{/n} "Naaki..."

languages.text: « Nous n'avons pas menti. Nous n'aurions jamais osé. » {n}Randor observe Kibellah, ses cheveux sombres et ses cicatrices.{/n} « Naaki... »
languages.original_text: "We did not lie. We would never have dared." {n}Randor looks over at Kibellah, her dark hair, her scars.{/n} "Naaki..."

languages.text: «No mentimos. Jamás haríamos eso». {n}Randor inspecciona a Kibellah: su pelo negro, sus cicatrices...{/n} «Naaki...».
languages.original_text: "We did not lie. We would never have dared." {n}Randor looks over at Kibellah, her dark hair, her scars.{/n} "Naaki..."

traits.locale_text: «No mentimos. Jamás haríamos eso». {n}Randor inspecciona a Kibellah: su pelo negro, sus cicatrices...{/n} «Naaki...».

languages.text: 「嘘はついていません。まさかそんな無謀なことなど」{n}ランドールはキベラ、彼女の黒い髪、その傷跡をじっと見る。{/n}「ナアキ…」
languages.original_text: "We did not lie. We would never have dared." {n}Randor looks over at Kibellah, her dark hair, her scars.{/n} "Naaki..."

traits.locale_text: 「嘘はついていません。まさかそんな無謀なことなど」{n}ランドールはキベラ、彼女の黒い髪、その傷跡をじっと見る。{/n}「ナアキ…」

languages.text: “我们并没有骗您，我们绝不敢这么做。”{n}兰德尔看着绮贝菈，看着她的黑发，她的伤痕。{/n}“拿基……”
languages.original_text: "We did not lie. We would never have dared." {n}Randor looks over at Kibellah, her dark hair, her scars.{/n} "Naaki..."

traits.locale_text: “我们并没有骗您，我们绝不敢这么做。”{n}兰德尔看着绮贝菈，看着她的黑发，她的伤痕。{/n}“拿基……”

languages.text: "Wir haben nicht gelogen. Das hätten wir nie gewagt." {n}Randor blickt zu Kibellah, auf ihre dunklen Haare, ihre Narben.{/n} "Naaki ..."
languages.original_text: "We did not lie. We would never have dared." {n}Randor looks over at Kibellah, her dark hair, her scars.{/n} "Naaki..."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben nicht gelogen. Das hätten wir nie gewagt." {n}Randor blickt zu Kibellah, auf ihre dunklen Haare, ihre Narben.{/n} "Naaki ..."

languages.text: "Yalan söylemedik. Asla cüret etmeyiz." {n}Randor; Kibellah'yı, siyah saçlarını, yara izlerini süzüyor.{/n} "Naaki..."
languages.original_text: "We did not lie. We would never have dared." {n}Randor looks over at Kibellah, her dark hair, her scars.{/n} "Naaki..."
